Language.Name: All coupled Neural-Network Layer
Language.Text: All coupled neural network layer. Integration of bonding layer and activation layer. You can set [learning coefficient] [dropout rate] at learning.

Item.Name: Number of neurons
Item.Text: Number of neurons in the layer. It is directly connected to the number of output buffers.

Item.Name: Dropout rate
Item.Text: Percentage to ignore the previous layer. 1.0 ignores all previous layer's output.
